summary: An email from March 16, 2021, forwarding two attached evidence spreadsheets (one for Florida and one for New York) pertaining to the Epstein investigation. The sender thanks the recipient for assistance.

events.title: Email Forwarding Evidence Spreadsheets
events.description: An email was sent containing attached evidence spreadsheets for the Epstein investigation, covering Florida and New York cases.

keyFacts: As of March 2021, evidence spreadsheets for the Epstein investigation were being compiled and shared, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
The evidence was organized into two separate files: one for Florida (Case_Evidence_-FL.xlsx) and one for New York (Case_Evidence_NY.xlsx).
The email is marked as external, suggesting communication possibly between different agencies or with outside parties.
The document references an ongoing need for assistance in the Epstein investigation.
